greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least prime p not already included in the sequence such that p + 2n is a prime.
comment: Includes only odd numbers. The sequence includes all prime numbers since, for any prime, another prime exists differing by an even number.
mathematica: t = {}; Do[p = 3; While[! (PrimeQ[p + 2 n] && ! MemberQ[t, p]), p = NextPrime[p]]; AppendTo[t, p], {n, 100}]; t (* _T. D. Noe_, Feb 04 2014 *)
results.author: _Carmine Suriano_, Feb 03 2014
